com.exacttarget.etpushsdk
Class ETCloudPageManager

java.lang.Object
  com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETCloudPageManager

public class ETCloudPageManager
extends Object

ETCloudPageManager is responsible for retrieving CloudPage messages from the ET Servers. You shouldn't have to use this class directly. Use CloudPageListAdapter for reading CloudPage messages.

Method Summary
static ETCloudPageManager cloudPageManager()
          Get the ETCloudPageManager singleton
 void onEventBackgroundEvent(BackgroundEvent event)
          Internal EventBus handler for fetching CloudPage messages after we come back into foreground.
 void onEventCloudPagesResponse(CloudPagesResponse response)
          Internal EventBus handler for CloudPage messages received from the server.
 void refreshData()
          Fetch updated CloudPage messages from the ET Servers.

refreshData

public void refreshData()
Fetch updated CloudPage messages from the ET Servers. Called automatically by the system when the app returns to the foreground.
